name: Mimighoul Cerberus
desc:
FLIP: If it is the Main Phase: Apply these effects in sequence.
● Banish the top 3 cards of your Deck, then Special Summon 1 of your banished monsters to your opponent's field in Defense Position.
● Give control of this card to your opponent.
During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to your opponent's field in face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Mimighoul Cerberus" once per turn. Your opponent cannot target face-up Spells you control with card effects.
